html:
• Eikon search string for individual stock moves: STXBZ
  • The Day Ahead newsletter: http://tmsnrt.rs/2ggOmBi
  • The Morning News Call newsletter: http://tmsnrt.rs/2fwPLTh

The Dow and the S&P 500 were set for a record open on Tuesday as worries about the Omicron variant of the coronavirus subsided and travel stocks bounced, while Ford gained on upbeat electric pickup production forecast .N

At 8:42 a.m. ET, Dow e-minis 1YMc1 were up 0.40% at 36,599. S&P 500 e-minis ESc1 were up 0.33% at 4,802, while Nasdaq 100 e-minis NQc1 were up 0.19% at 16,516.25.

The top two NYSE percentage gainers premarket .PRPG.NQ:
** Nine Energy Service Inc <NINE.N>, up 9.3%
** Borr Drilling Ltd <BORR.N>, up 8.3%

The top three NYSE percentage losers premarket .PRPL.NQ:
** Core & Main Inc <CNM.N>, down 8.2%
** Sea Ltd <SE>, down 7.3%
** Armstrong Flooring Inc <AFI.N>, down 7.2%

The top three Nasdaq percentage gainers premarket .PRPG.O:
** Plus Therapeutics Inc <PSTV.O>, up 71.4%
** Hoth Therapeutics Inc <HOTH.O>, up 39.6%
** Immix Biopharma Inc <IMMX.O>, up 29.6%

The top two Nasdaq percentage losers premarket .PRPL.O:
** Avrobio Inc <AVRO.O>, down 17.1%
** Valneva SE <VALN.O>, down 14.2%


** Airbnb Inc ABNB.O: up 0.6% premarket
BUZZ-Airbnb gains on settlement over Cuba sanctions violations (Full Story)

BUZZ-Credit Suisse raises PT for Chevron on higher commodity prices (Full Story)

** Carrier Global Corp CARR.N: up 1.3% premarket
BUZZ-Carrier Global rises on $500 mln share buyback program (Full Story)

** Coca-Cola Co KO.N: up 0.5% premarket
Vita Cola COCO.O: up 0.4% premarket
BUZZ-Guggenheim picks favorite beverage stocks for 2022, names Vita Coco 'best idea' (Full Story)
